scripts.build:sass: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true assets/stylesheets/scss/application.scss assets/stylesheets/css/application.css
scripts.watch:sass: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true assets/stylesheets/scss/application.scss assets/stylesheets/css/application.css --watch --recursive
